summary: Just a small fix for jokerine's great dragobone arrow replacer.
descriptionHtml: Loved this mod but it did not work in first person so i fixed that. You NEED Jokerine's "No More Fork-Like Dragonbone Arrows" first. So please [url=#]download[/url] and endorse that if you like it. Place arrow.nif in Skyrim\Data\meshes\dlc01\Weapons\dragonbone.
author: jokerine
